visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with each month's temperature provided. Custom colors should be applied to the data series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart to display the 'Monthly Average Temperature' with styled axes and labels. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 20px. The x-axis represents the months with labels styled in a medium gray color and a font size of 14px, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius with similar styling. The data series includes the monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color of teal applied. The legend is enabled and styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 14px. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to provide more space around the title and the bottom of the chart.
